context_of_use: This use case allows both admins and customers to view and download reports for analysis.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: access to reports for personal analysis
admin: ability to monitor business performance through sales reports
description: This use case enables customers and admins to view and download general and sales-related reports.
preconditions: User has the necessary permissions to view reports
postconditions: User successfully views and downloads the requested reports
assumptions: Users have access to the reporting system
Reports are available for viewing and downloading
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to view and download reports.
The system shall allow admins to view sales reports.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of reports available for download
main_flow: 1. customer/admin requests to view reports → system displays available reports
2. customer/admin selects a report to view → system presents the report details
3. customer/admin chooses to download the report → system initiates the download process
4. customer/admin receives the downloaded report → system confirms successful download
